body:
Comment 96: 
Andy, it turns out the change Ian referenced might not be sufficient to disable the
behavior that is causing the crashes.  Can you try patching CL 7569047?

Here is some background information: I am able to reproduce "wait: bad address" failures
(among others) at ToT.  These failures persist with IgnorePreciseGC set to 1.  However,
with CL 7569047 applied I have yet to observe a failure.
